title: Personalized Image Generation with Deep Generative Models: A Decade Survey
author: Yuxiang Wei (Harbin Institute of Technology), Yiheng Zheng (Harbin Institute of Technology), Yabo Zhang (Harbin Institute of Technology), Ming Liu (Harbin Institute of Technology), Zhilong Ji (Tomorrow Advancing Life), Lei Zhang (The Hong Kong Polytechnic University), Wangmeng Zuo (Harbin Institute of Technology), ...
relevance_why: The survey covers various generative models that could inspire the application of similar methodologies to audio generation tasks, including adaptations for personalized audio experiences.
background: The task involves creating personalized images based on user-specific concepts and contextual descriptions using deep generative models, specifically focusing on algorithms like Generative Adversarial Networks and Diffusion Models.
contribution: The paper introduces a unified framework for personalized image generation, addressing various generative models and their unique personalization techniques to enhance comparison and understanding.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous studies mainly focused on individual generative models without a comprehensive perspective on their personalization capabilities.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work integrates various generative approaches into a cohesive framework, allowing for systematic analysis across different architectures.

key_innovation: Presents a unified framework that standardizes the personalization process across varying generative models, enhancing clarity and facilitating comparisons.
real_world_impact: This survey may influence future research directions in personalized content generation, potentially leading to broader applications in creative AI and user-centered designs.

new_terms.Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs): **Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)** refer to a class of generative models that consist of two networks (generator and discriminator) that are trained together through adversarial processes.
new_terms.Text-to-Image (T2I): **Text-to-Image (T2I)** generation describes processes using textual inputs to guide the creation of images, enhancing control during image generation.

open_sourcing: Related works and resources can be found at [GitHub repository](https://github.com/csyxwei/Awesome-Personalized-Image-Generation).
